thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 34 of 3060
thread.title: Rohan Saldanha

author: Rohan Saldanha
title: Rohan Saldanha
text:
This is the second instance of wrong information presented by rentalcars.com.
Pick up.point Terminal 3 Dubai airport and same drop.off point. Call the rental car company - budget rent a car.. They say they have no service in Terminal 3 only terminal 1 and we have to come there to collect the car via the shuttle. Try doing that at 1:00 am in the morning. Wrong info after making the booking
